title: Design Systems: Creating Consistency at Scale

sections.title: Why Design Systems?
sections.markdown:
# Design Systems

How leading companies are implementing design systems to maintain visual consistency across products while enabling rapid development and innovation.

> "Consistency is key to scalability."

[Design System Examples](https://designsystemsrepo.com)

## Benefits

- Consistency
- Speed
- Innovation

:::alert
**Insight:** Design systems save time!
:::
